document.full_text: using a mixture of humor and bravado, twitter users flouted a ban on reporting early canadian election results on monday, running the risk of a c$25,000 fine ($26,300) and mocking an outdated law.
document.title: twitter users ignore ban on posting canada results
lines_and_colors: using a mixture of humor and bravado, twitter users flouted a ban on reporting early canadian election results on monday, running the risk of a c$25,000 fine ($26,300) and mocking an outdated law.
